attributes.action: ensure all MP's submit receipts for ALL expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MP's do not have to submit receipts for any claims under £25.00.  As a local council employee I cannot claim a single penny without a receipt.  When are Mp's going to live by the same rules that we have to adhere too?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
